articles.author: Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: What Anthony Scaramucci tells us about Donald Trump's White House
articles.description: Sean Spicer is out of the White House. Anthony Scaramucci is in.

articles.author: Miranda Green, CNN
articles.title: White House demands release of US prisoners in Iran
articles.description: Trump administration urges Iran to release all "unjustly imprisoned" Americans or face "serious consequences."

articles.title: US to ban Americans from visiting North Korea - CNN Video
articles.description: The US government will bar American citizens from traveling to North Korea because of "mounting concerns over the serious risk of arrest and long-term detention," the State Department said. CNN's Brian Todd reports.

articles.author: Nancy Coleman, CNN
articles.title: First woman enlists to become a Navy SEAL
articles.description: A woman will train with other potential officers this summer in hopes of becoming the first female Navy SEAL.

articles.author: Ralph Ellis, Nick Valencia and Devon Sayers, CNN
articles.title: Chief to recommend charges against Florida teens who recorded drowning ath
articles.description: A Florida police chief said he will recommend criminal charges be filed against five teenagers who who taunted a drowning man while filming his death from afar.

articles.author: Ralph Ellis, CNN
articles.title: Minneapolis police chief resigns
articles.description: Minneapolis Police Chief Jane√© Harteau resigned Friday, according to a news release from Mayor Betsy Hodges.

articles.author: Evan Simko-Bednarski and Mary Kay Mallonee, CNN
articles.title: 2 Baltimore officers plead guilty to racketeering charges
articles.description: Two former Baltimore police officers pleaded guilty Friday to federal racketeering charges, admitting that they committed armed robberies, made fraudulent overtime claims and filed false affidavits.

articles.author: Alanna Petroff
articles.title: China will import American rice for the first time
articles.description: The U.S. has inked a deal to sell rice to China for the first time ever.

articles.author: Debra Goldschmidt and Vasco Cotovio, CNN
articles.title: Charlie Gard brain scan news makes parents storm from court
articles.description: A lawyer representing Great Ormond Street Hospital said that a report on a new scan of the terminally ill baby made for "sad reading," the UK's Press Association reported.

articles.author: Paul Vercammen, CNN
articles.title: O.J. Simpson moved to another cell away from inmates
articles.description: Prison officials in Nevada have moved O.J. Simpson to a new cell and away from any inmates who might want to hurt or harass him in the months before he is set to be released.
